meanings.sent1: Planetology involves researching the characteristics of different planets in our solar system.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use planetology to learn more about the composition and behavior of planets.
meanings.sent3: The students found planetology fascinating as they learned about the unique features of each planet.
meanings.sent4: Exploring planetology is like unraveling the mysteries of distant worlds.
meanings.sent5: Through planetology, we can uncover the secrets hidden within the vastness of space.

meanings.definition: The branch of astronomy that deals with the study of planets.
meanings.sent1: In planetology, astronomers focus on understanding the planets in our galaxy.
meanings.sent2: Many discoveries in planetology have expanded our knowledge of the universe.
meanings.sent3: The professor's passion for planetology was evident in every lecture.
meanings.sent4: Planetology allows us to peer into the realms beyond our own planet.
meanings.sent5: Studying planetology opens up a world of exploration beyond Earth.
